alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Livingston; Monroe; Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:45PM EDT until April 01 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wayne County in western New York... Livingston County in western New York... Cayuga County in central New York... Southern Monroe County in western New York... Ontario County in western New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 344 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canandaigua, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Geneseo, East Rochester, Fairport, Dansville, Brighton, Letchworth State Park, Henrietta and Newark. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 40 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
